In the Tripred base, Dreadplague got something on the scanners.

Dread: Hey, Angel, looks like the cavalry's coming in! Who was it you 
contacted already?

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : DeathStar : :
> 
> DeathStar brings himself about and rockets off for the Tripred base.
> 
> DeathStar: Very well then. Let's meet our allies.
> 
> 
> Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Clawstorm: Artillery?!? What's the point?
> 
> His mouth was gapping open and his voice became a whispering 
> complaint.
> 
> Clawstorm: I'm made to be fearsome in close combat. You think these 
> talons can just shoot and grow back?
> 
> He calmed himself just a little.
> 
> Clawstorm: Alright then. Let's go meet Tyrael.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Assassin" <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> > : : DeathStar : :
> > 
> > DeathStar: No full combat. We would be outnumberd and they have 
an 
> > experianced commander in Rodimus Prime. I'll allow some artillary 
> > strikes on their base, however.

and

> idea...

find

such

its
